Hero.title1: Car delivery from Europe, China and the USA —
Hero.subtitle: Selection, inspection, purchase, delivery and customs clearance — all in one place

AboutUs.title: OUR ADVANTAGES
AboutUs.honestyText: We build cooperation based on trust. No hidden fees or fine print — you know all the terms before signing the contract.
AboutUs.trustText: We conclude official agreements according to Ukrainian law. Payment is transparent, in local currency, with full supporting documentation.
AboutUs.legalityText: Our journey in the automotive auction field began two decades ago. During this time, we’ve perfected the processes of selection, inspection, and delivery from anywhere in the world.
AboutUs.experienceText: We clearly specify the final car price in the contract. For you, this means confidence: no additional payments will appear later.
AboutUs.fixedPriceText: No hidden costs or unexpected charges. We guarantee fair deals without unpleasant surprises.
AboutUs.confidenceText: We work only with trusted logistics companies and auctions so you get your car safely and without risks.

AboutIntro.aboutIntroText:
Universal Warehouse — це ваш надійний провідник у світ автомобілів із США, Європи та Китаю. Ми вже понад 20 років працюємо у цій сфері, тому досконало розуміємо автомобільні ринки, страхові аукціони та всі нюанси безпечної доставки.
Ми відкриваємо доступ до величезного вибору авто з Америки, Європи й Азії, а наші експерти допомагають обрати саме ту машину, яка стане вашою гордістю.

ContactForm.subtitle: Our car expert will contact you shortly to clarify all details and help you choose the best option.
ContactForm.name: Name
ContactForm.success: Thank you! We'll contact you soon.

AuctionClients.subtitle: YOUR VEHICLE'S SERVICE ADVENTURE
AuctionClients.title: CARS FROM AUCTIONS FOR WHOLESALE CLIENTS

step1.title: COOPERATING WITH LEADING AMERICAN AUCTIONS
step1.text: Our company works with top US auctions like Copart, IAAI, and Manheim...

step2.title: CONVENIENT TOOLS FOR SELECTION AND INSPECTION
step2.text: We provide modern tools for easy and quick vehicle search...

step3.title: FULL LOGISTICS AND PAPERWORK SUPPORT
step3.text: We take care of all logistics — from US transport to final delivery...

step4.title: CAR CERTIFICATION IN UKRAINE
step4.text: Upon arrival, the car passes all necessary certification procedures...

step5.title: CONSULTATIONS AND SUPPORT
step5.text: Our team is always ready to help with car selection and paperwork...

experience.title: EXPERIENCE AND EXPERTISE
experience.text: We have been working in the automotive market for over 10 years across the USA and Europe. Our team knows all the nuances of auctions, logistics, and customs clearance.

partners.title: RELIABLE PARTNERS
partners.text: We cooperate exclusively with verified auction platforms — Copart, IAAI, and Manheim. This ensures honesty, transparency, and high-quality deals.

services.title: FULL SERVICE CYCLE
services.text: From car selection to certification and registration in Ukraine — we take care of the entire process. All you have to do is get behind the wheel.

transparency.title: TRANSPARENCY AND CONTROL
transparency.text: Our clients receive full access to reports: repair history, mileage, insurance cases. You always know exactly what you are buying.

wholesale.title: WHOLESALE TERMS
wholesale.text: We create profitable solutions for businesses and wholesale clients. A flexible cooperation system helps you save even more.

support.title: 24/7 SUPPORT
support.text: Our team is always in touch, ready to answer all your questions and accompany you every step of the way.

Footer.contactText: Join us to receive updates on innovative design and brand development.
Footer.companyStatement: Fortex® is a company registered in the United Kingdom. All services are delivered directly by Fortex, with no third-party involvement.
